entries: Through luck or through skill, you managed to survive a catastrophic maritime disaster, such as a shipwreck or being thrown overboard. You have a keen sense for weather or situations that are similar to the one you escaped.
Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Strength or Wisdom, and one is a free ability boost.
You're trained in the {@skill Survival} skill and the {@skill Lore||Weather Lore} skill.
You gain the {@feat Forager} skill feat.
